meta-review.comment: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2 Turbocharged takes the fast and furious fun of the original and revs it up with some improvements, but it still lacks a major overhaul. The added vehicle classes and expanded events offer a nice injection of variety, but the overall experience feels largely familiar. While the multiplayer updates add some spice, the limited environments still put a speed bump in the way. This sequel delivers more of the same blistering action and toy-like charm, but it may not quite zoom to the top of the podium.
